blueprint.description: Installs GIMP on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [GIMP](https://www.gimp.org/) is a free and open-source raster graphics editor used for image manipulation and image editing, free-form drawing, transcoding between different image file formats, and more specialized tasks. GIMP is released under GPLv3+ license and is available for Linux, macOS, and Microsoft Windows.
blueprint.name: GIMP
blueprint.title: GIMP
